name: MPS DEVELOPMENT
description:
Over 10 years of web-development experience in full stack Web and cross-platform mobile development:
MPS development makes simple Web applications as well as complicated, high-loaded and extendable Web portals like Online booking, Logistics, applications for travelling and tourism, Hospitality business, Tracking systems, Data Scrappers, Enterprise Software, Creating Web systems to control UAVs,  Avia software.
We are startups and successful experience of launching 2 startups allows us to offer high-quality solutions. Our software developers have a proven record of delivering unique solutions, based on emerging technologies and products. We have a skilled team of professionals, exceptional problem-solvers, who use innovative approaches to solve all kinds of issues.
